attributes.action: To allow Travis Crouch to visit South Africa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst applying for indefinate leave to remain in the UK our good friend has had to submit his passport.

The turn aroound for this service is rediculous and as a result he is unable to attend a family event in South Africa without giving up the £750 processing fee he has already paid.

We would like the Home Office to return his passport without canvelling his application.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
